sn18.11:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn18.11:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn18.11:4.6: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, rāhula, cakkhuṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn18.11:4.8: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn18.11:4.10: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn18.11:4.19: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn18.11:4.21: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn18.11:4.24: “Evaṃ passaṃ, rāhula, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati … pe …
sn18.11:4.33: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
